activities.name: Reception of Students
activities.description: Students will be welcomed at the gates of the university and will be given a tour of their respective departments.

activities.name: Schools Address
activities.description: Students will be addressed by their respective schools in Jinnah Auditorium.

activities.name: Batch Photo
activities.description: Students will be gathered in convocation ground for day and night batch photo.

activities.name: School Activities
activities.description: Students will be taken to their respective schools for fun activities.

activities.name: Life at NUST
activities.description: Student will be addressed regarding life at NUST in Jinnah Auditorium and NET Hall.

activities.name: Sports Fest
activities.description: Different sports competitions will be held in NBS ground.

activities.name: School visits
activities.description: Students will be given a tour of different schools.

activities.name: Plantation & Cleanliness Drive
activities.description: Students will be taken to NBS & Scholar Avenue for plantation and cleanliness drive.

activities.name: Sports Fest
activities.description: Different sports competitions will be held in NBS ground.

activities.name: School Visits
activities.description: Students will be given a tour of different schools.

activities.name: Society & Club Activities
activities.description: Students will be given a tour of different societies and clubs.

activities.name: ON Fest
activities.description: Festival of NUSTians will be held in NBS ground.

activities.description: Closing ceremony will be held in Jinnah Auditorium.
